thread.section_title: Hotel Scalinata di Spagna - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Traditional Italian Hotel Located In A Perfect Location
thread.title_full: Traditional Italian Hotel Located In A Perfect Location - Review of Hotel Scalinata di Spagna, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ish986
title: Traditional Italian Hotel Located In A Perfect Location
text: We booked this hotel on the day we got there and were lucky to get a room for £35 per night. The location is perfect in the middle of everything and you cant hear any of the hustle n bustle. The staff were really nice and the breakfast was nice. The rooms were immaculate and clean and the décor was really nice. Would defo book this hotel if you get a good deal.
